Package data

Class getDataFromXML

java.lang.Object
data.getDataFromXML
public class getDataFromXML
extends java.lang.Object
This class is used to read data from xml files.
Author:
jules

    • getUtilisateur

      public static Utilisateur getUtilisateur​(java.lang.String login, java.lang.String passWord)
      Parameters:
      login - login entered by user
      passWord - password entered by user
      Returns:
      Utilisateur Returns the user from XML file which corresponds to the given login and password

    • getUserById

      public static Utilisateur getUserById​(java.util.UUID userId)
      Parameters:
      userId - UUID of the user we want to get from XML file.
      Returns:
      Utilisateur Returns the user corresponding to a given UUID, if there is no such user, returns null

    • getConvById

      public static Conversation getConvById​(java.util.UUID convId)
      Parameters:
      convId - UUID of the conversation we want to read from XML.
      Returns:
      Conversation Returns the conversation corresponding to the given UUID, if there is no such conversation, returns null.

    • getConvListOfUser

      public static java.util.List<Conversation> getConvListOfUser​(Utilisateur u)
      Parameters:
      u - user object from which we want the conversation list.
      Returns:
      List of conversation For a given user, return the list of conversations he participates in.

    • getConvNamesOfUser

      public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getConvNamesOfUser​(Utilisateur u)
      Parameters:
      u - user object from which we want the names of conversations he participates in.
      Returns:
      List of names For a given user, return the list of names of the conversations he participates in.

    • getUserListFromIdList

      public static java.util.List<Utilisateur> getUserListFromIdList​(java.util.List<java.util.UUID> userIdList)
      Parameters:
      userIdList - ID list that we use to find corresponding users.
      Returns:
      List of users For a given UUID list, returns the corresponding list of users.
